name: Build It
description: Build It is a revolutionary game, it can be contained in the "Real Life" category which includes: Roleplay, Survival, Building, and Adventures.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 / AMD FX-8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 2GB / AMD R9 280X or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
